gui.form.base

Class Form

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.form.base.Form
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsciiTypable, Clickable, FunctionTypable, Typable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FormWrapper

    public class Form
extends java.lang.Object
implements Typable, Clickable
    Form in which FormObjects can be placed.
